site.description: Update site for Vary. Vary is a environment based on Eclipse IDE for improving computer programming learning. This environment allows user to program algorithms in a pseudocode way and automatically transform them into a executable code in several languages, such as C or C++. It also allows the measurement of quality of the algorithms from the SonarQube platform.

category-def.name: vary.pseudocodigo.dsl
category-def.label: Vary

This environment allows user to program algorithms in a pseudocode way and automatically transform them into a executable code in several languages, such as C or C++. It also allows the measurement of quality of the algorithms from the SonarQube platform.
